par.name: bNode
par.note: pass true if you want parentNode, else you get offsetParent

x_symbol.return: a reference to the element's parent element, or null if not found

comment.author: mf
comment.note: Don't use this function, access the native property directly. This function is provided only for backwards-compatibility.
